title: Timothy B. Ruel
text:
I am a fourth year PhD candidate in the Department of Statistics and Data Science at Northwestern University. My research involves using Bayesian ideas such as Markov chain Monte Carlo to develop new methods and applications for approximating pseudolikelihood functions.
